title: Lifetime-Whispers of Fear [2013]
description:
Lifetime-Whispers of Fear (2013)

Air Date: 4 Oct 2013

Summary: Telling the chilling story of a tough, hot-headed cop with a troubled past who teams up with a polished, politically savvy Assistant District Attorney to take down a dangerous stalker, the thriller is inspired by a true story from the book Ã¢â‚¬Å“Whisper of Fear: The True Story of the Prosecutor Who Stalks the StalkersÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, by Rhonda Saunders, a criminal prosecutor who wrote the law on stalking in California. 

Frustrated with the judicial systemÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s indifference towards stalking cases, ambitious A.D.A Ã¢â‚¬Å“Julia WinstonÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (Jodi OÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Keefe) is determined to establish a task force charged with tracking and prosecuting predators before they harm or kill their victims. However, JuliaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬Å“boys clubÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ of bosses dismisses her concerns as trivial and repeatedly rebuffs her efforts. Meanwhile, recently hired detective Ã¢â‚¬Å“Diane HarkinÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (Drea de Matteo) faces similar resistance from fellow officers in her new precinct when she discovers numerous unsolved stalking cases. But for Diane, the fight to change the system is personal. She herself is on the run, having fled a violent ex-husband who wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t rest until he catches up with her and their young son. Crossing paths on an especially harrowing case of a woman terrorized by an obsessive former lover (Mena Suvari), Diane and Julia find common ground and form an unlikely partnership to tackle the case. But the two soon realize that to beat stalkers at their own game, they canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t play strictly by the rules, and that bringing these criminals to justice means both Diane and Julia must put their careers -- and lives -- on the line. Henry Simmons (Ã¢â‚¬Å“NYPD BlueÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Ã¢â‚¬Å“SharkÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½) also stars as HarkinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s partner Ã¢â‚¬Å“Cliff.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
